subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: C. C. Sabathia, in his best start this season, allowed two runs, only one of them earned, in seven innings. He gave up seven hits and struck out six to even his record at 2-2.
snippet: C. C. Sabathia, in his best start this season, allowed two runs, only one of them earned, in seven innings. He gave up seven hits and struck out six to even his record at 2-2.
